## OptionalFromToParams type

A paramter builder type which uses [FromToParams](./core-types.fromtoparams.md) where `from` or `to`<!-- -->, or both can be set as optional.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type OptionalFromToParams<GKey extends keyof FromToParams> = MakeOptional<FromToParams, GKey>;
```
